definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements

sentences.english: She was a rigorously chaste woman.
The heroine of the play is rigorously chaste.
sentences.chinese: 這齣戲的女主角可真節烈。
